verses.text: 約拿不悅約拿對這事非常不高興，並且發起怒來，

words.note: A more formal way to say 'not happy'.
Lit. 'not ordinary'.
Forms an idiomatic expression with the preceding verb and noun, 'to burst into anger'.

verses.text: 就向耶和華禱告，說：「耶和華啊！我還在本國的時候，不是這樣說過嗎？我知道你是有恩典有憐憫的 神，不輕易發怒，並且有豐盛的慈愛，轉意不降災禍，所以我才急忙逃往他施去。

words.note: A common V-O compound in religious contexts.
Often preceded by a space in Bibles to distinguish from common '神'.
A common verb-object compound.
Often translated as 'hesed' in the Old Testament.

verses.text: 耶和華啊！現在求你取去我的性命吧，因為我死了比活著還好。」
神安排一棵蓖麻耶和華回答說：「你這樣發怒對不對呢？」

words.note: A common verb-object compound.
Forms an A-not-A question 'right or not right?'

verses.text: 約拿出了城，在城東坐下；他在那裡搭了一座棚，坐在棚蔭之下，要看看那城究竟怎樣。

words.note: A common verb-complement compound.
Classical particle, functions like 'de' or forms nominal phrases.

words.definition: to want to, to be about to

words.note: Reduplication of verb indicates a casual or brief action.

verses.text: 耶和華 神安排一棵蓖麻，使它長起來高過約拿，成了陰影遮蓋他的頭，免他受苦；約拿因這棵蓖麻，就大大歡暢。

words.note: Often used interchangeably with 耶和華 (LORD)
A plant with large leaves providing shade.
Verb complement, signifies 'start to' or 'rise up'.
Reduplication intensifies the meaning.
Often used in literary or religious contexts.

verses.text: 次日黎明的時候， 神安排一條蟲子，蛀蝕這棵蓖麻，蓖麻就枯槁了。

words.definition: measure word for long, thin objects

words.note: Describes damage caused by insects or decay.
Describes something becoming dry and shriveled, often plants.

verses.text: 日出的時候， 神又安排炎熱的東風。烈日曬在約拿的頭上，以致發昏，他就為自己求死，說：「我死了比活著還好。」

words.note: Refers to the intense heat of the sun.

words.definition: so that, with the result that

verses.text: 神問約拿：「你因這棵蓖麻這樣發怒，對不對呢？」約拿說：「我發怒以至於死都是對的。」

words.note: A common A-not-A question structure.

words.definition: so much so that, even to
words.note: Indicates a result or extent, often extreme.

verses.text: 神教訓約拿耶和華說：「這棵蓖麻，不是你栽種的，也不是你使它長大的，一夜長成，一夜死去，你尚且愛惜它，

words.note: The speaker in this verse is identified as the LORD.
Indicates completion of growth.
Used to emphasize a point by contrast or further implication.

verses.text: 何況這尼尼微大城，其中不曉得分辨左右手的有十二萬多人，並且有許多牲畜，我怎能不愛惜呢？」

words.note: 得 functions as a particle indicating completed action or result after a verb.
Idiomatic expression for basic understanding or innocence.
